about_the_game:
Outcasts of Dungeon is a third person fantasy action.
Being in the role of a powerful War Mage with dozens of deadly weapons and spells, defend your kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders.
Battle enemies through a story-based campaign across multiple difficulty dungeon-like levels and upgrade your combat skills to match better your unique play style.
Will you disintegrate ghouls with a powerful electric stream, pound scavengers flat with a sky falling rock spell, or freeze flying gargoyles and shatter them with a magic blast? No matter which weapons you choose, you can be sure that the invaders will be defeated!
Features:
-Procedurally generated dungeons – Twisting passages, long halls, and wide-open chambers all require a war mage's expertise to clear them.
-Story-based Campaign – Fend off monsters across four acts to discover the mysterious power behind their relentless assaults.
-12 Unique Enemies – Including scavengers, ghouls, flying gargoyles, and of course, a bunch of ugly orcs.
-Multiple Weapons and Spells – From spears and swords to the magical elements.
-Persistent Upgrades – Unlock improvements to your weapons and magic spells as you progress through the campaign.
-Outfit Usage – Light armor suits better for achieving the best mobility and heavy armor for more defense potential.
-Scoring System and Leaderboard – Compete with your friends for the title of Master Outcaster!
-Support PS, Xbox Controller
